page.title: 11THE SOUTH NOTTS.BUS COMPANY
page.content: The South Notts.Bus Company is a small concern.It operates between Nottingham and Loughborough using one set route. Buses pass regularly through East Leake each hour but more frequently at busier times of the day. The service is very popular with local people.Its fares are said to be the cheapest in Nottinghamshire,the reason being that,with one popular route,good profits can be made whilst charging a reasonable fare. Although most people own cars,a good number of them use the bus to get to work at either Nottingham or Loughborough. The buses are blue in colour and most of them are old.Breakdowns take place fairly frequently. South Notts. buses are used to convey children fom outlying villages to the Harry Carlton Comprehensive School.
